      • contractActionGet

        public WorkflowStateTransition contractActionGet(Integer contractId,
                                                 Integer actionId)
                                          throws ApiException
        Gets the action matching the specified action ID. Users get the action if the user can take the action given the current state of the specified smart contract instance and the user's associated application role or smart contract instance role.
        Parameters:
        contractId - The id of the contract (required)
        actionId - The id of the action (required)
        Returns:
        WorkflowStateTransition
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body

      • contractActionPost

        public LedgerActionOutput contractActionPost(Integer contractId,
                                             WorkflowActionInput actionInformation)
                                      throws ApiException
        Executes an action for the specified smart contract instance and action ID. Users are only able to execute the action given the current state of the specified smart contract instance and the user's associated application role or smart contract instance role.
        Parameters:
        contractId - The id of the workflow instance (required)
        actionInformation - Parameters for a particular action (optional)
        Returns:
        LedgerActionOutput
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body

      • contractActionsGet

        public WorkflowStateTransitionList contractActionsGet(Integer contractId,
                                                      Integer top,
                                                      Integer skip)
                                               throws ApiException
        Lists all actions, which can be taken by the given user and current state of the specified smart contract instance. Users get all applicable actions if the user has an associated application role or is associated with a smart contract instance role for the current state of the specified smart contract instance.
        Parameters:
        contractId - The id of the contract (required)
        top - The maximum number of items to return (optional)
        skip - The number of items to skip before returning (optional)
        Returns:
        WorkflowStateTransitionList
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body

      • contractGet

        public Contract contractGet(Integer contractId)
                     throws ApiException
        Creates and deploys a new smart contract instance by adding the instance to the Workbench database and sending a transaction to the blockchain. This method can only be performed by users who are specified within the Initiators collection of the workflow within the Workbench application configuration.
        Parameters:
        contractId - The id of the contract (required)
        Returns:
        Contract
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body

      • contractGetWithHttpInfo

        public ApiResponse<Contract> contractGetWithHttpInfo(Integer contractId)
                                              throws ApiException
        Creates and deploys a new smart contract instance by adding the instance to the Workbench database and sending a transaction to the blockchain. This method can only be performed by users who are specified within the Initiators collection of the workflow within the Workbench application configuration.
        Parameters:
        contractId - The id of the contract (required)
        Returns:
        ApiResponse<Contract>
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body

      • contractPostCall

        public com.squareup.okhttp.Call contractPostCall(WorkflowActionInput workflowActionInput,
                                                 Integer workflowId,
                                                 Integer contractCodeId,
                                                 Integer connectionId,
                                                 ProgressResponseBody.ProgressListener progressListener,
                                                 ProgressRequestBody.ProgressRequestListener progressRequestListener)
                                          throws ApiException
        Build call for contractPost
        Parameters:
        workflowActionInput - The set of all contract action parameters. (optional)
        workflowId - The ID of the workflow. (optional)
        contractCodeId - The ID of the ledger implementation. (optional)
        connectionId - The ID of chain instance running on the ledger. (optional)
        progressListener - Progress listener
        progressRequestListener - Progress request listener
        Returns:
        Call to execute
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to serialize the request body object

      • contractPost

        public WorkflowActionInput contractPost(WorkflowActionInput workflowActionInput,
                                        Integer workflowId,
                                        Integer contractCodeId,
                                        Integer connectionId)
                                 throws ApiException
        Gets the smart contract instance matching a specific workflow instance ID. Users who are Workbench administrators get the smart contract instance. Non-Workbench administrators get the smart contract instance if they have at least one associated application role or is associated with the smart contract instance.
        Parameters:
        workflowActionInput - The set of all contract action parameters. (optional)
        workflowId - The ID of the workflow. (optional)
        contractCodeId - The ID of the ledger implementation. (optional)
        connectionId - The ID of chain instance running on the ledger. (optional)
        Returns:
        WorkflowActionInput
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body

      • contractPostWithHttpInfo

                                                                 Integer workflowId,
                                                                 Integer contractCodeId,
                                                                 Integer connectionId)
                                                          throws ApiException
        Gets the smart contract instance matching a specific workflow instance ID. Users who are Workbench administrators get the smart contract instance. Non-Workbench administrators get the smart contract instance if they have at least one associated application role or is associated with the smart contract instance.

        workflowId - The ID of the workflow. (optional)
        contractCodeId - The ID of the ledger implementation. (optional)
        connectionId - The ID of chain instance running on the ledger. (optional)

        ApiResponse<WorkflowActionInput>
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body

      • contractsGet

        public ContractList contractsGet(Integer top,
                                 Integer skip,
                                 Integer workflowId)
                          throws ApiException
        Lists the smart contract instances of the specified workflow. Users who are Workbench administrators get all smart contract instances. Non-Workbench administrators get all smart contract instances for which they have at least one associated application role or is associated with a smart contract instance role.
        Parameters:
        top - The maximum number of items to return (optional)
        skip - The number of items to skip before returning (optional)
        workflowId - The ID of the associated workflow (optional)
        Returns:
        ContractList
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body

                                                  Integer skip,
                                                  Integer workflowId,

        (asynchronously) Lists the smart contract instances of the specified workflow. Users who are Workbench administrators get all smart contract instances.
